about_the_game:
Void Inside is a first-person psychological horror game


In a world devastated by radiation, the surface of the Earth has turned into a lifeless wasteland.
People long ago sought refuge in underground shelters, but even there, death caught up with them through disease. The protagonist is the last survivor in his shelter

He is completely alone, surrounded by silence and the bodies of those he once knew. After many days of despair, he decides that staying any longer is meaningless. He leaves the shelter and boards a monorail, not knowing where it leads or what awaits him ahead


  • An atmosphere of claustrophobia and hopelessness
  • Horror conveyed through sounds and the sense of presence
  • The monorail as a symbol of the final refuge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 @ 3.3GHz (4th Generation) or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 TI or AMD Radeon R7 370, with a minimum of 3GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible audio card
  • Additional Notes: Best experienced with headphones

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
